eegdash.dataset.DS003688
========================

Open multimodal iEEG-fMRI dataset from naturalistic stimulation with a short audiovisual film (OpenNeuro ``ds003688``). Access recordings and metadata through EEGDash.

.. rst-class:: sd-badges

:bdg-light:`Modality: ieeg` :bdg-light:`Tasks: 2` :bdg-light:`License: CC0` :bdg-light:`Subjects: 51` :bdg-light:`Recordings: 107` :bdg-light:`Source: openneuro`

-------------------

     - ``DS003688``

     - Open multimodal iEEG-fMRI dataset from naturalistic stimulation with a short audiovisual film
   * - Year
     - Unknown
   * - Authors
     - Julia Berezutskaya, Mariska J. Vansteensel, Erik J. Aarnoutse, Zachary V. Freudenburg, Giovanni Piantoni, Mariana P. Branco, Nick F. Ramsey

     - `doi:10.18112/openneuro.ds003688.v1.0.7 <https://doi.org/10.18112/openneuro.ds003688.v1.0.7>`__
   * - Source links
     - `OpenNeuro <https://openneuro.org/datasets/ds003688>`__ | `NeMAR <https://nemar.org/dataexplorer/detail?dataset_id=ds003688>`__

Quickstart
----------

**Install**

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install eegdash

**Load a recording**

.. code-block:: python

   from eegdash.dataset import DS003688

   dataset = DS003688(cache_dir="./data")
   recording = dataset[0]
   raw = recording.load()

**Filter/query**

.. tab-set::

   .. tab-item:: Basic

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = DS003688(cache_dir="./data", subject="01")

   .. tab-item:: Advanced

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = DS003688(
             cache_dir="./data",
             query={"subject": {"$in": ["01", "02"]}},
         )
